leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-晶体/结构生成与逆向设计生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 生成→筛选→验证→多目标优化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 生成模型 + 筛选器 + 工作流

unit.unit_name: 约束满足/可行性检查/筛选

queries: [WEB] materials stability screening machine learning github

tools.name: CHGNet
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained universal neural network potential for charge-informed atomistic modeling
tools.detailed_description: A pretrained universal neural network potential for charge-informed atomistic modeling. It enables molecular dynamics simulations and structure relaxation with charge awareness.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen addon for parsing Quantum ESPRESSO files
tools.detailed_description: An add-on for pymatgen that provides input/output handling and parsing capabilities for Quantum ESPRESSO calculation files.

tools.name: atomate2-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: Atomate2 workflows for LAMMPS molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for atomate2 that implements workflows for the LAMMPS molecular dynamics code, enabling automated MD simulations.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for end-to-end learning with rdkit and pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and crystals, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen.

tools.name: dfttk
tools.one_line_profile: DFT workflows for finite temperature thermodynamics
tools.detailed_description: Density functional theory workflows for calculating finite temperature thermodynamics properties, built upon the atomate workflow framework.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching employing chemically-guided bond distortions
tools.detailed_description: A package for defect structure-searching that employs chemically-guided bond distortions to identify ground-state defect structures in materials.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Generation, processing and analysis of defect supercell calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python software for the generation, pre-/post-processing, and analysis of defect supercell calculations, implementing efficient and reproducible defect simulation workflows.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for first principles calculations of surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating and analyzing slabs for first-principles calculations of surfaces, facilitating surface science workflows.

tools.name: Surrogates.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate modeling and optimization for scientific machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A library for surrogate modeling and optimization, providing various surrogate models (Kriging, Radial Basis Functions, etc.) for scientific machine learning applications.

tools.name: SMACT
tools.one_line_profile: Semiconducting Materials by Analogy and Chemical Theory
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to aid materials design and informatics, focusing on semiconducting materials and chemical theory-based screening.

tools.name: xtalmet
tools.one_line_profile: Distance functions and evaluation metrics for crystals
tools.detailed_description: A Python package containing a variety of distance functions for crystals and evaluation metrics for crystal generation models, useful for validating generative models.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: Drawing and rendering atoms and molecules using Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for drawing and rendering high-quality images of atoms and molecules using the Blender 3D creation suite.

tools.name: uMLIP-Interactive
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for running simulations with universal machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for running molecular dynamics and relaxation simulations using various universal machine learning interatomic potentials (MACE, CHGNet, SevenNet, etc.), facilitating interactive exploration of material properties.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced 2D/3D visualization of crystal structures in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A highly configurable visualization tool for ASE and Pymatgen structures within Jupyter Notebooks, supporting SVG (2D) and Three.js (3D) rendering for inspecting atomic configurations.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Plotting tools for electronic band structures with orbital contributions
tools.detailed_description: A plotting utility using pymatgen to generate electronic band structure plots with RGB scales representing atomic or orbital contributions, aiding in electronic structure analysis.

tools.name: fusion_surrogates
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate transport models for tokamak fusion simulation
tools.detailed_description: A library providing surrogate models for transport simulations in tokamak fusion reactors, enabling faster prediction of plasma properties compared to high-fidelity physics simulators.

tools.name: ChemHTPS
tools.one_line_profile: Automated high-throughput screening platform for materials and chemicals
tools.detailed_description: An automated platform for high-throughput screening (HTS) that manages the generation, simulation, and analysis of materials and chemical data, developed by the Hachmann Lab.

tools.name: atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built workflows for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library of computational materials science workflows that works with FireWorks to automate and manage high-throughput calculations (e.g., VASP, FEFF) for materials property prediction.

tools.name: matminer
tools.one_line_profile: Data mining and feature extraction library for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library for data mining in materials science, providing tools to retrieve data from databases and generate descriptors (features) from composition and crystal structures for machine learning.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing tools based on Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for processing materials simulation data, built upon Pymatgen, facilitating data analysis and manipulation tasks in computational materials science.

tools.name: matbench-discovery
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for materials discovery ML models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for evaluating machine learning models in the context of high-throughput materials discovery, simulating realistic discovery campaigns to benchmark model performance.

tools.name: structuregraph-helpers
tools.one_line_profile: Helpers for manipulating Pymatgen structure graphs
tools.detailed_description: A utility library providing helper functions for working with structure graphs in Pymatgen, facilitating graph-based analysis of crystal structures.

tools.name: perovskites-distortions
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for hybrid organic-inorganic perovskite structures
tools.detailed_description: A collection of functions to manipulate and analyze the structural distortions of hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites, developed by LCBC-EPFL.

tools.name: construction_zone
tools.one_line_profile: Generators for nanoscale atomic scenes for microscopy simulation
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating nanoscale atomic scenes and structures, primarily designed for setting up Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy (S/TEM) image simulations.

tools.name: syba
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic Bayesian Classification algorithm
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Synthetic Bayesian Classification (Syba) algorithm, likely used for classifying materials or chemical data based on synthetic priors.

tools.name: MALA
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Learning Algorithms framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for machine learning materials properties from first-principles data, enabling the acceleration of electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Custom workflows for the Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: A package that merges Pymatgen, Custodian, and FireWorks into custom workflows specifically designed for the Materials Project's high-throughput infrastructure.

tools.name: atomate2
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation workflows for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: The successor to Atomate, providing a modern library of computational materials science workflows for running and managing high-throughput calculations with improved flexibility and performance.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for running and analyzing ab-initio molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations, leveraging the Materials Project stack (Pymatgen, Custodian, FireWorks).

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Robust materials analysis and structure manipulation library
tools.detailed_description: Python Materials Genomics (pymatgen) is a core library for materials analysis, defining classes for structures and molecules, and providing support for input/output handling of many electronic structure codes.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Alloy system analysis add-on for Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for Pymatgen containing classes and functions specifically for describing and analyzing alloy systems.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis modules for Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A specialized add-on for Pymatgen focused on the analysis of point defects in materials, including formation energy calculations and thermodynamic analysis.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Database management tool for Materials Project style databases
tools.detailed_description: An addon to Pymatgen that facilitates the creation and management of MongoDB databases for storing materials data in the Materials Project format.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Input/output validator for VASP calculations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive validator for VASP calculation inputs and outputs, ensuring compatibility with Materials Project data standards and quality control.

tools.name: m3gnet
tools.one_line_profile: Materials graph network for property prediction and relaxation
tools.detailed_description: A materials graph neural network incorporating 3-body interactions, serving as a DFT surrogate for crystal structure relaxation and property prediction.

tools.name: MEGNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Networks as a Universal Machine Learning Framework for Molecules and Crystals
tools.detailed_description: MatErials Graph Network (MEGNet) is an implementation of deep learning models for materials science, specifically designed to predict properties of molecules and crystals using graph neural networks.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for analyzing diffusion in materials
tools.detailed_description: A specialized module extending pymatgen to provide tools for analyzing diffusion pathways and properties in materials simulations, such as molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: eToxPred
tools.one_line_profile: Toxicity and synthetic accessibility prediction tool for small molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to predict the general toxicity and calculate the synthetic accessibility (SA) score for small molecules, aiding in drug discovery and safety assessment.

tools.name: MOF-CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: CGCNN variant for predicting methane uptake in MOFs
tools.detailed_description: A modified Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Network (CGCNN) tailored for Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs) to predict volumetric methane uptake, incorporating specific structural features like pore limiting diameter.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Slater Koster tight-binding topological hamiltonian solver
tools.detailed_description: A scientific Python package for solving Slater-Koster tight-binding Hamiltonians, useful for calculating electronic band structures and topological properties of materials.

tools.name: MT-CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Multitask Learning with Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: An integration of Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks with multitask learning techniques to improve material property prediction performance.

tools.name: matbench-genmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking metrics for generative materials models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing standardized metrics for evaluating generative models in materials science, inspired by Guacamol and CDVAE benchmarks.

tools.name: CSLLM
tools.one_line_profile: LLM system for crystal synthesizability prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Large Language Model based system designed for high-accuracy prediction of the synthesizability and precursors of crystal structures.

tools.name: CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (CGCNN), a deep learning framework for predicting material properties directly from crystal structures.

tools.name: ALIGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Atomistic Line Graph Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network architecture that explicitly models bond angles and interactions using line graphs, achieving high accuracy in predicting material properties.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: MAterials Simulation Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A workflow automation tool for managing high-throughput computational materials science simulations, particularly with VASP and pymatgen. (Developed by UW-CMG)

tools.name: InvDesFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design workflow for high-temperature superconductors
tools.detailed_description: An integrated workflow for the inverse design of high-temperature superconducting materials, combining generative models, stability checks, and critical temperature prediction.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for drawing ternary diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed for creating ternary diagrams (phase diagrams) for materials science without heavy dependencies like pymatgen.
